name: Valiant Souls: The Rune Knight Academy (First demo)
name_original: Valiant Souls: The Rune Knight Academy (First demo)
description:
This is the very first and yet incomplete (but fully playable) version of the game which is still in early development stage.  Valiant Souls is an indie-RPG passion project made by two people, featuring professional voice actors in the battle scenes and music by Japanese composer Yoshino Aoki (Breath of Fire 3, Final Fantasy XV).

Valiant Souls tells the story of the young knight Vine and his friends on their journey through a world troubled by war, conspiracies and the mysterious demise of an ancient civilization that happened over 800 years ago.

You can check out the music of our game here:

https://soundcloud.com/valiantsoulsrpg/sets/valiant-souls-ost
